entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
